id="menu-item-108029" class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-108029"><a href="https://www.wric.com/path-of-destruction/">SPECIAL REPORT: Path of class="site-header__search-drop__toggle" href="#">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class="screen-reader-text">Search</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class="icon">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n<svg  aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" data-react-component="AlertBanners"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\n<div id="content" class="site-content">\n\t<aside class="ad-unit ad-unit--leaderboard">\n\t\t<div class="ad-unit__content">\n\t\t\t  <div   id="acm-ad-tag-billboard1-billboard1"   data-slot=\'{"pos":"billboard1","is_companion":true,"is_oop":false,"refresh_on_resize":true,"size":[320,50],"sizes":[[[1280,0],[[728,90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,30]]],[[1024,0],[[728,90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,30]]],[[768,0],[[728,90]]],[[641,0],[[320,50]]],[[0,0],[[320,50]]]],"amp_multi_size":"320x50","lazyload":false,"wx_targeting":[],"module_refreshable":false,"fold":"atf"}\'   data-unit=\'{"tag":"billboard1","tag_id":"billboard1","dfp_id":"5678","tag_name":"mg.wric","ad_disabled":"0","facebook_only":""}\'   data-targeting=\'{"pos":"billboard1","fold":"atf","category":"health","kw":"from-fevers-to-coughs-experimental-device-detects-symptom-spikes-in-classrooms"}\'   data-path=\'/5678/mg.wric/health\' id="primary" class="content-area">\n\t\t\t<main id="main" class="site-main">\n\n\t\t\t\t\n<article class="article post-597076 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-education category-health category-news category-u-s-world category-video tag-classroom tag-coronavirus tag-covid-19 tag-experimental-device tag-symptoms" data-component="article">\n\t\n<header class="article-header">\n\t<h1 class="article-title">\n\t\tFrom fevers to coughs, experimental device detects symptom spikes in classrooms\t</h1>\n\n\t\t\t<div class="article-eyebrow">\n\t\t\t<a href="https://www.wric.com/health/">Health</a>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\n\t<div class="article-meta">\n\t\t\t\t\t<p>by: Nexstar Media Wire</p>\n\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\tPosted: <time datetime="2020-10-07T19:13:42-04:00">Oct 7, 2020 / 07:13 PM EDT</time>\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class="article-meta--sep"> / </span>Updated: <time datetime="2020-10-07T19:13:44-04:00">Oct 7, 2020 / 07:13 PM EDT</time>\t\t\t</div><!-- .article-meta -->\n\n\t\n\t<div class="article-lead-share">\n\t\t\n<div data-component="addThisInline" class="social-share addthis">\n\t<div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>\n</div>\n\t</div>\n</header><!-- .article-header -->\n\n\t\n\t<div class="article-content rich-text">\n\t\t\n\t\t\n<figure class="wp-block-embed-youtube wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio"><div class="wp-block-embed__wrapper">\n<span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe class=\'youtube-player\' width=\'900\' height=\'507\' src=\'https://www.youtube.com/embed/GLYO8ULyWFY?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;fs=1&#038;autohide=2&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;wmode=transparent\' allowfullscreen=\'true\' style=\'border:0;\'></iframe></span>\n</div></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>(NEXSTAR) &#8212; Clorox has developed an experimental device to help detect an increase in symptoms such as fevers, coughs and sneezes in the classroom.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>With schools returning to in-person learning, the device is meant to help educators make more informed decisions about classroom safety amid the coronavirus pandemic, the company said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>\xe2\x80\x9cThis school year is unlike any we have faced before, which is why we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to expand upon our solutions for prevention and provide teachers and school administrators with a way to identify early illness symptoms,\xe2\x80\x9d Magnus Jonsson, Clorox&#8217;s vice president of cleaning, <a href="https://investors.thecloroxcompany.com/investors/news-and-events/press-releases/press-release-details/2020/The-Clorox-Brand-Unveils-Innovative-Device-that-Detects-Symptom-Spikes-in-the-Classroom/default.aspx" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">said in a statement</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The American Academy of Pediatrics reported last month that child cases of COVID-19 make up 10% of the U.S. total, an increase from 2% in April. <a href="https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/69/wr/mm6939e2.htm?s_cid=mm6939e2_w" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention</a> has said cases in school-age children began increasing in early September as many returned to physical classrooms.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The new device alerts educators when a classroom has surpassed a predetermined symptom limit. </p>\n\n\n\n<aside class="promo-link">\n\t<a\n\t\thref="https://www.wric.com/news/covid-19-cases-rising-among-us-children-as-schools-reopen/"\n\t\tclass="promo-link__link"\n\t>\n\t\tCOVID-19 cases rising among US children as schools reopen\t</a>\n</aside>\n\n\n\n<p>It uses thermal sensors to identify potential body temperature spikes, and device software detects upticks in coughs and sneezes.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>When an increase in symptoms in the classroom surpasses the threshold, educators receive real-time notifications.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Each year, schools face the challenge of preventing one cough or sneeze from turning into a cold or flu outbreak,&#8221; the company said in a statement. &#8220;For schools that have decided to resume in-person learning, the added pressure of SARS-Cov-2, the virus that causes COVID-19, means taking every possible safety precaution is of the utmost importance.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>To ensure the privacy of those in the classroom, information gathered by the device is &#8220;anonymized and never recorded or saved&#8221; so that only the symptoms are identifiable, Clorox said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong>LATEST HEADLINES:</strong></p>\n\n\n<ul class="wp-block-latest-posts wp-block-latest-posts__list"><li><a href="https://www.wric.com/news/virginia-news/more-dates-added-to-halloween-harvest-at-busch-gardens/">More dates added to Halloween Harvest at Busch Gardens</a></li>\n<li><a href="https://www.wric.com/news/republicans-push-towards-confirming-barrett-to-scotus/">Republicans push towards confirming Barrett to SCOTUS</a></li>\n<li><a href="https://www.wric.com/news/local-news/richmond/apollo-update-dog-shot-in-richmond-drive-by-shooting-on-the-upswing/">Apollo update: Dog shot in Richmond drive-by shooting &#8216;on the upswing&#8217;</a></li>\n<li><a href="https://www.wric.com/news/local-news/richmond/rpd-chief-establishes-external-advisory-committee-for-community-dialogue/">RPD Chief establishes External Advisory Committee for community dialogue</a></li>\n<li><a href="https://www.wric.com/news/local-news/21-year-old-new-kent-man-ejected-killed-after-crash-in-james-city-county/">21-year-old New Kent man ejected, killed after crash in James City County</a></li>\n</ul>\n\t\t<div class="article-content-cta-group">\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</div><!-- .rich-text -->\n\n\t\n<footer class="article-footer">\n\t\t\t<p class="article-copyright">Copyright 2020 Nexstar Inc. story</h2>\n\t\t\t\t\n<div data-component="addThisInline" class="social-share addthis">\n\t<div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>\n</div>\n\t</div>\n</footer><!-- .article-footer data-slot=\'{"pos":"mr1_mobile","is_companion":true,"is_oop":false,"refresh_on_resize":true,"size":[300,250],"sizes":[[[900,0],[]],[[0,0],[[300,250]]]],"amp_multi_size":"300x250","lazyload":false,"wx_targeting":[],"module_refreshable":false,"fold":"atf"}\'   data-unit=\'{"tag":"mr1_mobile","tag_id":"mr1_mobile","dfp_id":"5678","tag_name":"mg.wric","ad_disabled":"0","facebook_only":""}\' class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">\n\t\tMore Health Stories\t</h2>\n\n\n<div class="article-list__content">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class="article-list__blanketing-link" article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--has-excerpt"\n\t\t\tdata-article-id="603794"\n\t\t\tdata-index="0"\n\t\t\tdata-collection="article-list1"\n\t\t\tdata-anvato-params="null"\n\t\t>\n\t\t\t\n<div\n\tclass="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-list-id="article-list1"\n\tdata-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile"\n\tdata-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 876px&quot;]"\n>\n\t\t\t<h3 class="article-list__article-title">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tStimulus checks: Mnuchin says stimulus deal before election will be &#8216;difficult&#8217;\n\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<footer class="article-list__article-byline">\n\t\t\t\tby Nexstar Media Wire <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-15T14:36:02-04:00">Oct 15, 2020</time>\t\t\t</footer>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<p>WASHINGTON (NEXSTAR) -- Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin told CNBC on Wednesday a coronavirus relief bill being announced before the election will be difficult.</p>\n<p>House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Mnuchin spoke on Wednesday for an hour to discuss a possible coronavirus stimulus package. </p>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span>\n\t\t\t\t\tRead the Full Article\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--has-excerpt"\n\t\t\tdata-article-id="604798"\n\t\t\tdata-index="1"\n\t\t\tdata-collection="article-list1"\n\t\t\tdata-anvato-params="null"\n\t\t>\n\t\t\t\n<div\n\tclass="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-list-id="article-list1"\n\tdata-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile"\n\tdata-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 876px&quot;]"\n>\n\t\t\t<h3 class="article-list__article-title">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tIsrael eases some lockdown measures as virus cases decline\n\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<footer class="article-list__article-byline">\n\t\t\t\tby TIA GOLDENBERG, Associated Press <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-15T13:41:17-04:00">Oct 15, 2020</time>\t\t\t</footer>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<p>TEL AVIV, Israel (AP) \xe2\x80\x94 Israel decided on Thursday to relax some of the restrictions imposed during a monthlong nationwide lockdown that was meant to drive down a raging coronavirus outbreak.</p>\n<p>The country\'s coronavirus Cabinet voted to resume daycare and pre-school for children up to six years old, allow some businesses \xe2\x80\x94 those without walk-in customers \xe2\x80\x94 to reopen, and cancel a 1,000 meter (yard) restriction on movement. Those limits are set to be lifted on Sunday.</p>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span>\n\t\t\t\t\tRead the Full Article\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class="icon icon--arrow">\n\t<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 17.938 10.94">\n\t\t<path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z"/>\n\t</svg>\n</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t</div>\n\n\n\t<figure class="article-list__article-thumb href="https://www.wric.com/health/months-into-pandemic-iran-sees-worst-wave-of-virus-deaths/">\n\t\t\n\t\t<article\n\t\t\tclass="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--has-excerpt"\n\t\t\tdata-article-id="604746"\n\t\t\tdata-index="2"\n\t\t\tdata-collection="article-list1"\n\t\t\tdata-anvato-params="null"\n\t\t>\n\t\t\t\n<div\n\tclass="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-list-id="article-list1"\n\tdata-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile"\n\tdata-current-image-context="[&quot;16:9&quot;,&quot;(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 876px&quot;]"\n>\n\t\t\t<h3 class="article-list__article-title">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tMonths into pandemic, Iran sees worst wave of virus deaths\n\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<footer class="article-list__article-byline">\n\t\t\t\tby NASSER KARIMI and ISABEL DEBRE, Associated Press <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-15T12:06:00-04:00">Oct 15, 2020</time>\t\t\t</footer>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<p>TEHRAN, Iran (AP) \xe2\x80\x94 Iran\'s capital has run out of intensive care beds as the country confronts a new surge of infections that is filling hospitals and cemeteries alike. The single-day death toll hit a record high three times this week.</p>\n<p>Eight months after the pandemic first stormed Iran, pummeling its already weakened economy and sickening officials at the highest levels of its government, authorities have not been able to prevent its spread. In a country devastated by American sanctions, the government considers an economic shutdown like the ones imposed in Europe and the United States impossible. </p>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span>\n\t\t\t\t\tRead the Full Article\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class="icon icon--arrow">\n\t<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 17.938 10.94">\n\t\t<path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z"/>\n\t</svg>\n</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t</div>\n\n\n\t<figure
